casebody.data:
Robert D. VELEZ, II, Petitioner, v. DEPARTMENT OF HOMELAND SECURITY, Respondent. No. 06-3305. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. March 12, 2007.

Before LOURIE, GAJARSA, and LINN, Circuit Judges.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
